title: The Big Book of Quotes: Funny, Inspirational and Motivational Quotes on Life, Love and Much Else
description: A Great Anthology of WisdomOver 3,500 quotes sharing the words of wisdom of the great and the good from down the ages.Makes a perfect giftA quote for every thought, occasion and feelingIdeal for empowering your lifeA life affirming collection of quotes
